text: Breakaway is the second album by American singer Kelly Clarkson; it was released on November 30, 2004, by RCA Records. The album debuted at number three on the Billboard 200 for selling 250,000 copies. It has sold over 6 million copies in the United States and has been certified six times Platinum by the RIAA. Breakaway received two awards at the 2006 Grammy Awards including "Best Pop Vocal Album" and "Best Female Pop Vocal Performance" for the single "Since U Been Gone". Five singles were released from the album, "Since U Been Gone", "Behind These Hazel Eyes", "Because of You", "Walk Away", and "Breakaway". ==References== Category:2004 albums Category:Kelly Clarkson albums Category:Grammy Award-winning albums Category:RCA Records albums
title: Breakaway (Kelly Clarkson album)
